name: TriAgain
description:
Play as a Dr. Mike Triangle, a recent graduate from Triangle University trying to make his way in a hectic shape world.  Guide Mike past the immeasurably horrific shapes while vanquishing his fellow triangles. 

Instructions:  To move, the player uses the "A" and "D" keys. To change the orientation of Mike, the player uses the arrow keys; left, up and right.  Note that if the player is on the right, he must go back to the middle to be able to rotate to the left (same goes for left to right).

-This game was made in only one day for a Uni project. 

_____________________________________________________

Credits:

All the drawings are hand drawn by me.

Music:  Youtube audio library.

Sound effects: mouth.

Assets from Unity assets store:

Text: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/beta-projects/textmesh-pro-8412...

Scene fader: 

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/simple-fade-scene-...
